familyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.description: Former member/president of Mobile Payroll Construction LLC, of which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest.

Former director/chairman/president of Mobile Payroll Construction Manager Corp., of which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, and is part of other entity structures.

conflictDescription: TEST DESCRIPTION FOR THE CONFLICT (Friendly Name): Mobile Payroll Construction
